mapper.select: select sum(mile_price) from mileage where member_id = #{member_id}
select sum(decode(sign(mile_price), 1, sum(mile_price))) from mileage where member_id = #{member_id} group by mile_price
select sum(decode(sign(mile_price), -1, sum(mile_price))) from mileage where member_id = #{member_id} group by mile_price

select * from (select rownum rnum, member_id, mile_date, mile_price, mile_content from (select * from mileage where member_id = #{member_id} order by mile_date desc)) where rnum>= #{startrow} and rnum<= #{endrow}
select count(*) from mileage where member_id = #{member_id}
